interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: All About the Benjamins (New Line Platinum Series)
Review Date: 2021/02/19
Store: Beres, Julianne  (Actor),     Bray, Kevin  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Fully Loaded DVDs, New Line Platinum Series
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'All About the Benjamins (DVD) (WS)', "There's a lot of money in Miami, but bounty hunter Bucum Jackson (Ice Cube) has yet to claim his share of it. Bucum dreams of opening his own private investigation firm, but right now he's on the trail of slippery con artist Reggie Wright (Mike Epps). Bucum's wild pursuit of Reggie leads to the middle of a multi-million dollar diamond heist, where Reggie's flailing hysteria allows him to avoid capture. Things start to look up for Reggie when he realizes he's the sole winner of a $60 million lottery! Unfortunately, the winning ticket is still in Reggie's wallet ... in the getaway van ... and has been discovered by the diamond thieves. And then Reggie sees Bucum. Bucum may not trust Reggie, but if Reggie's story is true it means a whole lot more than the bail money ... and if it's a scam, Bucum can use Reggie as bait to catch the diamond thieves. Now, either way Bucum can't lose--because, after all, it's All About the Benjamins.", ']]>', 'Amazon.com', "Ice Cube cowrote, produced, and stars in this action caper. Bucum (Cube) is a bounty hunter (get it?) with dreams of big money. Reggie (Mike Epps) is a small-time grifter who also has dreams of big money and is at the top of Bucum's list to boot. Yep, you guessed it: tough guy/funny guy buddy flick.", 'All About the Benjamins', "is pretty much a by-the-numbers piece of work. There's plenty of macho posturing, gunfire, big-ticket items exploding, and curse words inserted into the script in lieu of actual punch lines. The plot has holes big enough to drive a locomotive through, but then again the plot isn't really the point. Epps's attempts at wacky comedy wear thin early on, but Ice Cube does a fine job, and together they do make quite a few moments hit. Best recommended for when you want turn-your-brain-off excitement.", '--Ali Davis']
Average Rating: 4.8

Review Text: We absolutely loved this movie. So funny
Review Title: Great movie. We watch it all the time
Rating: 5.0

Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy

Despicable Me 3
Steve Carell  (Actor),     Kristen Wiig  (Actor),     Pierre Coffin  (Director),     Kyle Balda  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Fully Loaded DVDs, Special Editions
["Illumination, who brought moviegoers Despicable Me, Despicable Me 2, and the biggest animated hit of 2015, Minions, continues the story of Gru, Lucy, their adorable daughters—Margo, Edith and Agnes—and the Minions in Despicable Me 3. After he is fired from the Anti-Villain League for failing to take down Balthazar Bratt, the latest bad guy to threaten humanity, Gru finds himself in the midst of a major identity crisis. But when a mysterious stranger shows up to inform Gru that he has a long-lost twin brother—a brother who desperately wishes to follow in his twin's despicable footsteps—one former super-villain will rediscover just how good it feels to be bad.Bonus Content:", 'Deleted Scene with Intro by Dana Gaier', 'Deleted Scene with Intro by Dana Gaier', 'Minion Moments', 'Minion Moments', 'Character Profiles', 'Character Profiles', 'The Making of Despicable Me 3', 'The Making of Despicable Me 3', 'Developing Dru', 'Developing Dru', 'The AVL Files', 'The AVL Files', 'Freedonia Visitors Guide', 'Freedonia Visitors Guide', 'Despicable Me\xa0TV', 'Despicable Me\xa0TV', '"Doowit" Sing-Along', '"Doowit" Sing-Along', '"Yellow Light" Music Video', '"Yellow Light" Music Video', 'Minion Mug Shots', 'Minion Mug Shots', 'Wanted Posters', 'Wanted Posters', 'Mini-Movie: The Secret Life of Kyle', 'Mini-Movie: The Secret Life of Kyle', 'There are multiple versions of this movie cover and each shipment is random. Customers are not guaranteed to receive specific cover or to receive multiple covers with multiple purchases.']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to enjoy comedy movies, particularly those centered around friendship, female camaraderie, and family dynamics. They have recently shown a fondness for action-comedy films, highlighting a willingness to explore humorous narratives with a more adventurous edge, yet still rooted in fun and light-heartedness.

- **Mediums:** The user's preference for the DVD format remains strong, as they emphasize physical media in their movie collection.

- **Rating Trend:** The user maintains a high average rating (5.0) for enjoyable films, indicating a penchant for engaging and emotionally resonant content. Their latest purchase reflects this trend, suggesting a satisfying blend of humor and entertainment.

- **Engagement Style:** Enthusiasm is a hallmark of the user’s reviews, as they often express joy in shared experiences with family, particularly with their daughter. Their recent review emphasizes enjoyment and repeated viewings, indicative of films that resonate within their personal life.

- **Key Themes:** The user values themes that celebrate relationships, humor, and camaraderie. They enjoy films that combine laughter with heartfelt moments, making both comedy and family films particularly appealing as they reflect their passion for shared fun and bonding experiences.

In summary, the user showcases a strong preference for light-hearted and comedic content that celebrates friendship, family, and shared joy, continuing to engage positively with films that resonate with their experiences and those of their loved ones.
